item.title: String Performance: The Fastest Way to Get a Stringâ€™s Length
item.description: Retrieving the character count of a string in .NET has various methods: using Span with Length, Length, or Enumerable.Count(). This article will prove which is the fastest method. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2026/01/25/string-performance-the-fastest-way-to-get-a-strings-length/

item.title: Collection Performance: High-Performance Collection Randomization in .NET
item.description: The article examines shuffling options in .NET 8, highlighting the performance of three APIs: LINQ.Shuffle(), Random.Shuffle(), and RandomNumberGenerator.Shuffle(). Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2026/01/18/collection-performance-high-performance-collection-randomization-in-net/
